name: Nightwatch (mastermagpie, W35, akilic, Cal Lycus)
description:
Created in 7 days for Brackeys Jam 2022.2

Theme: You're not alone.

  • mastermagpie- Programmer
  • akilic - Programmer
  • W35- Designer
  • Cal - Sound Engineer

/

You're lying in bed at night, unable to sleep... the moonlight coming in from the bedroom window is casting a dull light upon the vintage furniture. In front of the bedroom window, is a cabinet... was that cabinet always there? It looks oddly shaped... and it's moving..?!

/

  • [Mouse] to rotate the player.
  • [W][A][S][D] to move.
  • [E] to interact.
  • [R] to reload.

/

Goal: Explore the mansion and try not to get caught! Collect the 6 generator parts you need to fix the generator, collect the master key and head out of the front door of the mansion to escape!

Torch: The torch is your weapon. Shine the light on the glowing footsteps for 2 seconds. What you thought was a creepy monster will actually just be some furniture..?

Condition: Being spotted by a monster will make you feel unwell. The lower your condition, the worse your vision will become. Stand in the presence of green lamps, or use a fireplace as a checkpoint to recover.

Map: The map consists of two floors. There are 3 generator parts on each floor. The generator is on the bottom floor. The master key is on the top floor. The exit is in the big hall on the bottom floor, to the south.

/
